techmeme.title: How AI is reshaping the perfume industry, as fragrance tech startup Osmo promises 48-hour sample turnarounds and incumbents like DSM-Firmenich embrace the tech (Arabelle Sicardi/The Verge)
Daydream, which raised a $50M seed in June 2024 to build a generative AI shopping agent for fashion, launches in beta, with an app expected later this summer (Hilary Milnes/Vogue Business)
How innovations in garden technology, including AI-driven watering systems and robotic mowers, originally built for agriculture, are now reaching home growers (Mark Lane/Financial Times)
Imagen 4 is now available in the Gemini API and Google AI Studio, priced at $0.04 per image or $0.06 for "Ultra" mode that "precisely" follows user instructions (Google Developers Blog)
As Apple rolls out CarPlay Ultra, many carmakers are developing their own infotainment systems in hopes of generating more revenue from in-car services and data (Financial Times)
